Translations.Text: Ur pnamaret At Tezmamt, siwa s wawal aeidan, siwa wid degsen idensen. Init: "numen s wayen id irsen $uone$, id irsen $uowen. Oebbi nne$, akked Oebbi nnwen, Yiwen. Nekwni $uoeS d imvuaen
Akka ay ed Nessers, $uoek, Tazmamt. Wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, umnen yis. Ger wigi, kra umnen yis. I inekoen issekniyen nne£, siwa ijehliyen
Ur telliv temmalev kra n Tezmamt, uqbel tagi; ur p tepparuv, s uyeffus ik. Yili ad cukken inekkaoen
Xaii, neppa d issekniyen iberrzen, deg idmaren n wid iwumi teppunefk tmusni. Siwa imednas, i inekoen issekniyen nne£
Nnan: "a lemmer id rsen fellas, issekniyen s$uo Mass is"! Ini: "issekniyen ar Oebbi kan. Nek, d aneddao kan, ipbegginen
Ne$, ur steqnaaen ara s trusi $uoek, s$uone£, n Tezmamt, malen asen p. Deg waya, s tidep, aeunu, akked usmekti i ugdud iumnen
Ini: "Iqadd Oebbi, d anagi gari yidwen. Issen i illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Wid iumnen di tkerkas, u ugin Oebbi, widak d imexsuoen
Seirin k $ef uaaqeb. Lemmer macci d lajel ipwassnen, a ten id ias uaaqeb. Ih, a ten id ias, deqzalla, ur bnin
Seirin k $ef uaaqeb. Ih, Loahennama a ppezzi i ijehliyen
Ass ideg ar asen isbur uaaqeb, sennig sen, akw seddaw ivaoen nnsen, ad Yini: "jeoobet ayen txeddmem
A yimdanen iW iumnen, ni$ tamurt iW tewsaa. Ihi, aabdet iyI, Nek
Yal iman, ad ijeooeb tameppant; sinna, $uone£ a d tu$alem
Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ad asen Nerr tanezdu$t di Loennet m t$uofatin, ddaw as isaffen ppazzalen, degs ad wekkoen. D asaadi warraz n wid ixedmen lxio
wid iueboen, ippeklen $ef Mass nnsen
Aceal n leweuc, ur d neppawi ooeeq nnsen. Oebbi Ioeeq iten, u Ioeeq ikwen. Neppa, Issel, d Amusnaw
Ma testequav ten: "anwa i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, i Inuben s yiiij akked waggur"? A d inin, war ccekk: "d Oebbi". Ihi, acimi wexxoen
Oebbi Issugut l$it i win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS, u Iwezzen as. Ih, Oebbi Issen yal cci
Ma testequav ten: "anwa id Isse$layen aman seg igenni, Issidir yissen akal, deffir tmeppant is"? A d inin, war ccekk, "d Oebbi". Ini: "ccekoan i Oebbi". Maca, tegwti degsen, ur fhimen
Tameddurt agi, di ddunit, siwa lhawiyya, d wurar. D axxam aneggaru, war ccekk, ay d amuddir, lemmer eoin
Mara rekben di lbabuo, ad naaoen Oebbi, d idiniyen zeddigen $uoeS. Mi ten Isellek ar lberr, atnan la pcaraken
Ad nekoen ayen i sen Nefka, ad zhun, deqqal ad eoen
Day ur walan ara, Nerra loamaa n laman, wanag la pwaxvafen imdanen i sen d izzin? Day ad amnen di tkerkas, u ad nekoen l$it n Oebbi
Anwa i idensen kteo: win id isnulfan tikerkas af Oebbi, ne$ win irran tidep d tikerkas, mi t id tusa? Day macci d Loahennama ay d tanezdu$t i ijehliyen
Wid ijuhden ar loiha nne£, a ten Nenhu, war ccekk, s iberdan nne£. Ih, Oebbi Ippili ar lauuam
